Name: Forgotten Passages
About the game: 100 Tiny Levels. Stumble down a surreal rabbit hole and explore an atmospheric world composed of one hundred visual dreamscapes. Follow a girl and a mysterious bird through the wormholes of an eclectic universe. A Micro Adventure: This journey takes about one hour to play. A fast playthrough takes approximately 50 minutes. ( Plan for longer gameplay times if you stop and smell the roses or search for secret items ) Simple Gameplay: Collect the glowing feathers in each level to unlock the portal to the next area. A zen like experience designed to be played in a dark room with headphones.
